short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A clean and simple HUD for nexus clash that visualises the key environmental info

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Browser extension for the game Nexus Clash, simply injects images into the page to visualise key elements of the area description text.

May be useful for people who have difficulty reading, people short of time or people like me who want to get more flavour for whats going on while travelling between two places.
